claims.object: The addition of ubiquitin to a substrate protein

surface_layer.definition: The process of adding ubiquitin to a substrate protein.

deep_layer.mechanism: Involves three main steps: activation, conjugation, and ligation, performed by ubiquitin-activating enzymes (E1s), ubiquitin-conjugating enzymes (E2s), and ubiquitin ligases (E3s), respectively.
